page.syntax: V resize(size as N[,dimension as n])

argument.name: size
argument.description: The new number of elements in the array.

argument.name: dimension
argument.description: Optional. Default = 1. The dimension of the array to resize.

page.description: Resize an array, keeping its components intact.
page.discussion: The <ARRAY>.RESIZE() method increases the size of an array, without losing any of the existing data, as the REDIM command would.
